tool_description: Calculates material costs for kitchen renovation including cabinets, countertops, flooring, and appliances with regional pricing adjustments.

cabinet_quality.description: Cabinet quality level: budget, mid-range, premium, luxury

countertop_square_feet.description: Total countertop area in square feet

countertop_material.description: Countertop material: laminate, tile, granite, quartz, marble

flooring_square_feet.description: Kitchen flooring area in square feet

flooring_type.description: Flooring type: vinyl, ceramic, hardwood, stone

appliance_package.description: Appliance tier: basic, standard, premium, professional

region.description: Geographic region for pricing: northeast, southeast, midwest, southwest, west

tax_rate.description: Local sales tax rate as decimal

error_messages: Invalid measurements: All area measurements must be positive numbers.
Unknown material type: Specified material not found in pricing database.
Invalid quality level: Quality level must match available options.
Invalid region: Region must be northeast, southeast, midwest, southwest, or west.
Invalid percentage: Tax rate and contingency must be between 0 and 0.5.
usage: Input material specifications, quantities, and location to generate detailed cost estimate with regional pricing and optional labor costs.

countertop_cost.description: Total countertop material and fabrication cost

total_estimate.description: Final cost estimate including all factors
